trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around March 12th 2012
Summary: Heard what sounds like a super fast low flying jet, but it was too fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt work and heard what felt like the loud sonic booms of a super low flying jet over head. From the sound of it, it felt like it was headed South. I posted it on FB. Someone else mentioned seeing but a shadow from the 31st floor of a building. Shortly after the noticed an Apache Helicopter.
